description:
The Legendary, Oscar in Movieland
now on DSiWare.Following his mega
successful Oscar in Toyland
escapades, Oscar now plays the
leading actor in sensational worlds of
hit movies and TV shows. From Sci Fi
to Cartoon, Western to War, Horror to
Jurassic and a zany Game show host,
this is a game not to be missed. Oscar
in Movieland pushes the DSiWare to
new limits with eye popping graphics,
parallax scrolling backgrounds and
fabulous gameplay. This platformer is
packed with hours of fun and non-stop
action.
name:
Oscar in
Movieland
